mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.Id , a.ProRecordID , a.BeginTime , a.EndTime endTime, a.Mi, ( STUFF( ( SELECT ','+ FaultName FROM V_Fault WHERE ProRecordID=a.ProRecordID and Id=a.Id for xml path('') ),1,1, '' ) ) faultName, (select IsError from TEXC_ProductionRecord where ID=a.ProRecordID ) IsError FROM V_Fault AS a WHERE a.ProRecordID=#{proRecordID} ORDER BY BeginTime
